https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uqRAWPUYDsU4077KowZgpowSj6G.jpg Young Atsuko Kagami comes into possession of a magical mirror that lets her transform into anything she wishes. Atsuko Kagami then attempts to save a company which is about to be sold by using her transformation abilities. She also falls in love as a 22-year-old college student. Akko's Secret
